recommended_degree: Ekonomi, Teknik Informatika, Hubungan Internasional, Bahasa dan Sastra Inggris, Ilmu Komunikasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
>>Job Description:
Provide call center support to customers from worldwide, assisting with travel inquiries.
Manage and process reservations, including flight ticket and hotel bookings.
Handle booking modifications and cancellations efficiently and accurately.
Resolve customer issues and provide solutions to ensure a smooth travel experience.
Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction and service quality.

>>Requirements:
Excellent English proficiency (minimum B2 level), both written and verbal.
Comfortable working on a rotational 24/7 shift schedule to support different time zones.
Willingness to work 5 days a week.
Based in or willing to relocate to Yogyakarta.
